title: BRASSY
content:
—Friday’s road football game at Smithville also marked the debut of the 2015-16 Rockdale High School Big Blue. The band, directed by Adrian Acevedo, is coming off an awards-filled 2014-15 season and has been practicing since the last week of July. Trumpeter Geritt Davenport and bandmates will make their home debut Friday at Tiger Field.
